markdown: **Activate** <actions string="Two Actions" />Interact ([auditory](/Traits.aspx?ID=16), [emotion](/Traits.aspx?ID=60), [enchantment](/Traits.aspx?ID=61), [incapacitation](/Traits.aspx?ID=93), [magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106)) **Frequency** once per hour;  **Requirements** You're trained in  Performance ; **Effect** You blow the horn, creating a low growling sound. Creatures other than you within 60 feet must attempt a DC 30 Will save. Those who fail become overwhelmed with an animalistic rage and the urge to consume flesh for 1 round, or 1 minute on a critical failure. They indiscriminately attack the nearest target unaffected by the magic of the horn unless there are no such targets, at which point they set on each other. While affected, they gain a jaws [unarmed](/Traits.aspx?ID=199) attack that deals 1d8 piercing damage, deal an additional 2 damage with unarmed attacks, and lose the ability to use any weaponry. They also gain a +2 status bonus to saving throws against [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106) effects and pain, can detect bleeding creatures and open wounds as an [imprecise sense](/Rules.aspx?ID=412) with a range of 30 feet, and gain a +10- foot status bonus to their Speed. Lastly, they take a –1 penalty to AC and are unable to use [concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32) actions other than [Seeking](/Actions.aspx?ID=84). Creatures who critically succeed are temporarily immune for 24 hours.
